    • Constructor Detail

      • StorageOperation

        public StorageOperation(ServerStorage storage,
                        StorageOperationType type,
                        java.util.List<FsFile> transferList,
                        StorageOperationTransferLimiter limiter,
                        StorageOperationCallback callback,
                        StorageOperation linkedOperation,
                        boolean pending)
        Operation constructor.
        Parameters:
        storage - storage on which this operation belongs
        type - type of operation
        transferList - transfered files
        limiter - operation transfer speed limiter
        callback - callback that is executed after this operation finishes
        linkedOperation - linked operation
        pending - if operation should start in a pending state

    • Method Detail

      • addFollowingOperation

        public void addFollowingOperation(StorageOperation followingOperation)
        Add following operation. Operation should be picked up by StorageOperationManager and transfered to processing queue after this operation finishes.
        Parameters:
        followingOperation - following operation

      • getMaxTransferThroughput

        public ByteSpeed getMaxTransferThroughput(long sTime)
        Get the maximum transfer speed this operation can run at. Speed is a minimum from operation transfer limiter of this and linked operation.
        Parameters:
        sTime - current simulation time
        Returns:
        maximum transfer speed

      • getAvailableThroughput

        public ByteSpeed getAvailableThroughput()
        Get currently available throughput. Throughput is minimum from this operation's and linked operation's available throughput.
        Returns:
        currently available throughput
